name: Project Xmas (itch)
description:
Project Xmas - A Christmas Themed Horror Game

Find the key to electrical room before christmas, and bring back electricity in village.

But the twist is, the key is lost in dark forests, where a creepy monster is roaming.

This game is made in 7days.

Project Xmas is a Christmas Themed Horror Game with First Person Perspective.

You can watch how the game was made by clicking here.

*NOTE FOR MAC AND LINUX USERS*

I haven't tested the game on mac and linux, if any issue persists, leave a comment or mail me at gamelordzzz17@gmail.com

*CONTROLS*

WASD To Move

E To interact

Esc to pause or go back.

*CREDITS*

Image - https://wallpaperaccess.com/dark-forest
